Eager Pursuit.name: Eager Pursuit
Eager Pursuit.flavor: Your attack signals that you are the hunter and your enemy is the prey. If your foe flees, you won’t be far behind.
Eager Pursuit.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the target. The first time the target moves during its next turn, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier as an immediate reaction. You must end the shift closer to the target than you were when you began the shift.

Moon Wrath.name: Moon Wrath
Moon Wrath.flavor: You call out powerful arcane words that wreathe your weapon in pale fire.
Moon Wrath.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Moon Wrath.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and can’t teleport (save ends both).

Invisible Stride.name: Invisible Stride
Invisible Stride.flavor: You call upon the power of the eladrin to transport yourself a short distance, vanishing from view as you do so.
Invisible Stride.effect: You teleport 5 squares and become invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack.
